name: Mirth Corp
tag_list: hie, aco, hit, interoperability, meaningful-use, healthcare, transformation
overview:
Whether your focus is on aligning and connecting your provider community, powering your private Health Information Exchange, or delivering critical patient information to the point of care, Mirth can help.

Our agile and modular solutions components snap together neatly, so you can start small and build over time without worrying about backward compatibility or downstream integration headaches.

Mirth’s nimble and customer-driven innovation model results in purpose-built solutions designed to help you advance at every stage in your healthcare organization’s transformation. From achieving interoperability across your silo’d systems to advancing your initiatives to deliver accountable care across populations, we help you get real results in realistic timeframes.
